channel.title: AtomicMaya's Blog at the end of the universe
channel.description: A blog talking all things infosec, IoT, development and personal

image.title: AtomicMaya's Blog at the end of the universe

item.title: New Year, New Stuff!
item.description: A few changes to this blog.

item.title: Attending Chaos Congress, a highlight to close off the year.
item.description: Chaos Congress, the perfect place for this chaos goose to end the year.

item.title: I somehow spoke at BSides London! (an unscheduled development)
item.description: BSides London! (I failed the "Maya don't speak at a BSides challenge" again)

item.title: Making this blog easier to deploy!
item.description: Blogging, on the move?

item.title: It's been 3 years.
item.description: 3 years, 54 blog posts, a bit of a brain dump.

item.title: Attending BoncleSides!
item.description: I went to Newcastle upon Tyne to attend and speak at a conference. I ended up also winning second place at the CTF.

item.title: I went to C3Camp!
item.description: Chaos Computer Camp, or how a bunch of hackers and makers in a field in Germany make for quite a cool event!

item.title: I went to DEFCON31!
item.description: I have once more been graced with the opportunity to head to Vegas, for one of the worlds' largest hacker conferences.

item.title: JavaScript war crimes! At SteelCon.
item.description: Maya is back - with a vengeance - to teach people about JSFuck.

item.title: A Phishing Expedition
item.description: I somehow got involved in analyzing a phishing kit that was making the rounds... So let's talk about its technical aspects.

item.title: Yet another new job.
item.description: I have a new job, and am leaving academia.

item.title: Revamping my Bachelor's project.
item.description: I made a program to visualize Dominant Language Constellations in 3D, to digitize a process done until then with sticks and papier mach√©.

item.title: My gender paradigm shift.
item.description: Gender identity! A fun topic, and my personal stake in it.

item.title: I went to Wales for BSides Cymru
item.description: BSides Cymru, or why I went to hang out with a bunch of trans and queer folk in Wales

item.title: I finished my Master's degree!
item.description: Explaining the conspicuous disappearance of my Internet self. (ish)

item.title: Heading out to BSides London!
item.description: BSides London, one of the UK's biggest BSides events, and the friends that were made along the way.

item.title: I went to South Korea!
item.description: A big university trip halfway around the world.

item.description: BeerCon4, a cybersecurity event! (but at a trade show???)

item.title: I went to Scotland!
item.description: I attended a wedding in Scotland, and met up with some of my friends!

item.description: DEFCON30! All the shenanigans, all the hackers, all the bad luck?

item.title: Going back to Amsterdam and attending MCH!
item.description: I attended MayContainHackers 2022, and got into some shenanigans!

item.description: I went to Paris for the WaveGame competition, and we ended up winning!
